name: Armando Huerta = Pin-Up Artist Series (NSFW) Color version
description:
This is version 2 - it features his Color Pin-up Art Style

.

..............................................................................

for the "Black and White" artwork style, it is in another post.

it is labeled " Version 1 "

See my gallery for the posts, or search in Civitai for "Pin-Ups" or "Art Style"

..............................................................................

ARMANDO HUERTA = Pin-Up Artist Series (NSFW) Color version

.

a Lora Art Style

.

--- This is Version 2 --> The COLOR Pin-up art style

.

Armando Huerta ( born 19 May 1969 Mexico - died 02 May 2020 USA) was a

world famous fine art illustration and pin-up artist.

Mexican-born Armando Huerta was considered one of the prime artists of

contemporary American pin-up art.

Huerta was self-taught in regard to the human figure. In 1993, he specialized

in the airbrush art technique, and his career as a pin-up artist took off,

selling his first artwork to Playboy magazine.

.

He first came to public notice as an artist for High Impact's 'Double Impact'

comic book series (1995-1999), and as a result, Huerta became well-known among

fans of explicit "Bad Girl" comic book art.

By 2002, Huerta moved to the United States, where is pin-up art appeared on

pin-up stickers, famous magazine covers and in many art books.

He was a well-known guest at Comic-Con and other events, selling original

artworks and limited edition prints. His reputation as a "Bad Girl" artist

earned him the nickname "the Dark Lord of Pin-Ups".

.

Famous art-comics magazines that carried his cover art were Heavy Metal,

Airbrush Action, Show, Pain, Skin & Ink, Rebel Rodz, Knockout, Marquis and

Revolver. He also did many art commissions, which he sold through his website.

He ranked the erotic artists Hajime Sorayama, Alberto Vargas and

Olivia De Berardinis as major inspirations for his art style.

With his incredibly meticulous attention to detail, Armando created some of

the most beautiful and alluring women Pin-Ups the world has ever seen.

Since most of his early artworks (including magazine covers) was on the

extremely explicit side of adult-comics content, these issues were printed in

very small numbers, usually 2,000 to 5,000 each, which makes them highly

collectible and sought after for many art fans worldwide.

His original artworks just keeps going up in prices since his death in 2020.

.

..............................................................................

.

I used 50 well prepared high-resolution images (some fixed in Photoshop),

with many body pose positions, clothing styles, and hair styles.

Images used are of women over 22 years old, and less than 50 years old.

.

The art was trained on the original Stable-Diffusion-1.5-pruned.ckpt checkpoint,

to 2500 steps, with a batch of 2 for better training.

.

For Best results use LoRA weight parameters at = 0.7 , 0.8 , 0.9

You may test other settings while using diferent Checkpoints for a better

A.i. image render, and for Ai-realistic-Photos or Ai-Artworks.

As usual, the less weight number , the less it will look like his style of art.

.

Made using Kohya-ss. Place it in

"stable-diffusion-webui\extensions\sd-webui-additional-networks\models\lora" folder

in Automatic1111 WebUI root folder.

..............................................................................

The original LORA name is

arhuertacolor_v2

.

Other useful "Special Trigger words" you can use in your prompts...

Click on the (i) icon, when you download and install the LORA into your

Stable-Diffusion location in the menu.

In the LORA Menu, it is located on the top-right side of the LORA image.

It shows all the data and the original Text Blip-information for the

images, which you can then use parts of that text and put them into your

Prompts, to re-create such art style, or poses, for your Ai-create art.

.

Play around with the words for a better A.I. image creation.

Explain in words in your Prompt for EXACTLY what you want to see.

..............................................................................

..............................................................................

........................IMPORTANT NOTE........................................

.

This is a N.S.F.W. (Not Safe for Work) Lora ,

but can also create S.F.W. images (Safe For Work).

.

It can also re-create famous faces as Armando Huerta usually painted in his

pin-ups. I suggest Realistic-Vision Checkpoint if you want this feature

included in your Ai-Art, as this checkpoint already includes alot of

known famous faces.

Mixing diferent Checkpoints will also add to your desired style of art and

also re- create the same style of art as Armando Huerta painted his Pin-ups.

.

To MAKE SURE the image renders in a S.F.W. manner, include in

your "Negative Prompt" the following words....

((NSFW)), ((Nude)), ((Naked)), ((Vagina)), ((Pussy)), ((Nipples)), ((Ass))

.

.

To MAKE SURE the image renders in a N.S.F.W. manner, include in

your "Negative Prompt" the following words....

((Clothes)), (Clothing), (pants), (bikini), ((bra)), (underwear), (dress),

.

..............................................................................

..............................................................................
